name: Ghosts and Gravestones
description:
A game created for the Oct 2021 F# game jam, made entirely using the F# programming language.

Based on the popular Tents and Trees puzzles, this game creates random boards using a recursive algorithm for creating puzzle soluitons, then filling in the details. This approach ensures accuracy, as well incredible speed when producing even large boards (15x15).

You can view the code here:

https://github.com/ZZAAAKK/Ghosts-and-Gravestones
